response.original_title: Lionel Richie: The Outrageous Tour Live
response.overview: Lionel Richie - The Outrageous Tour Live is a UK VHS release by The Video Collection on 5th October 1987, which got re-released in the UK by Music Club and Video Collection International Ltd on 4th September 1989. Captured live at The Ahoy-Rotterdam-Holland during his 1987 European tour, Lionel Richie delivers an 'outrageous' performance filled with surprises: a moveable stage, his band members flying above his head and a piano that plays itself. But these effects are just icing on the cake, merely enhancing his fine performance.
response.tagline: The Outrageous Tour Live at Ahoy Rotterdam
response.title: Lionel Richie: The Outrageous Tour Live
